contentrichtext.text: {{about|the municipality in Belgium|other uses|Beloeil (disambiguation)}} {{ref improve|date=March 2013}} {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Belœil |picture=0 Beloeil - Château des Princes de Ligne (1).JPG |picture-width= |picture-legend=Castle of the Princes of Ligne |map=Beloeil_Hainaut_Belgium_Map.png |map-legend=Location of Belœil in [[Hainaut (province)|Hainaut]] |arms=CommunesBelgique-Beloeil.svg |flag=Flag of Belœil.svg |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-HT}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Ath|Ath]] |nis=51008 |pyramid-date=01/01/2006 |0-19=23.42 |20-64=59.98 |65=16.60 |foreigners=5.10 |foreigners-date=01/07/2005 |mayor=Alain Carion ([[Reformist Movement|MR]]) |majority=[[Reformist Movement|MR]], [[Humanist Democratic Centre|CDH]] |postal-codes=7970, 7971, 7972, 7973 |telephone-area=069 |web=[http://www.beloeil.be beloeil.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=32 |lon_deg=03 |lon_min=43 }} '''Belœil''' is a [[Belgium|Belgian]] [[municipality]] located in the province of [[Hainaut (province)|Hainaut]]. It is around 10 km south of [[Ath]]. On 1 January 2006 the municipality had 13,347 inhabitants. The total area is 61.55 km², giving a [[population density]] of 217 inhabitants per km². The municipality is named after the [[château of Belœil]], once the seat of [[Charles-Joseph, Prince of Ligne]], a military officer and man of letters who corresponded with [[Jean-Jacques Rousseau]] and [[Voltaire]]. ==Famous inhabitants== Apart from many members of the [[House of Ligne]], living in the castle, other famous people to have lived here include: * [[Émilie Dequenne]], actress * [[Pierre Descamps]], politician * [[Baron Empain]], entrepreneur and Egyptologist ==Twin towns== * {{Flagicon|Scotland}} [[Maybole]], [[Scotland]] ==Gallery== <gallery> Image:Beloeil CH1aJPG.jpg|The park and the castle of the Princes of Ligne. </gallery> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{commonscat-inline}} * [http://www.chateaudebeloeil.com/ Official site of the château] {{Hainaut}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Beloil}} {{Hainaut-geo-stub}} [[Category:Municipalities of Hainaut (province)]]
